helper.nlp

Class NLPManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.nlp.NLPManager

  • public class NLPManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Asynchronously manages NLP work
    Author:
    Moritz Dorka

    • Constructor Detail

      • NLPManager

        public NLPManager(int parsersToCreate)
        Ordinary constructor
        Parameters:
        parsersToCreate - number of parses to use
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number of given parsers is < 1

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Returns:
        if NLP is to be used; false otherwise

      • submitNLPJob

        public void submitNLPJob(NLPJob job)
        Submit a new NLP job for later execution
        Parameters:
        job - NLP job to perform
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given job is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the job cannot be queued

      • writeStatusOutput

        public void writeStatusOutput(ConsoleOutputFilter consoleFilter)
        Start to output status information about the ongoing NLP jobs

        may be stopped via a call to waitForNLPJobsToFinish()

        Parameters:
        consoleFilter - a handle to the console output filter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is null

      • waitForNLPJobsToFinish

        public void waitForNLPJobsToFinish()
        Blocks until all NLP jobs have finished execution;

        after this has been called no new jobs will be processed

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there were problems while shutting down the worker threads
